byline.original: Wireless to THE NEW YORK TIMES

abstract: German Army's Paris activity is indus and financial; city has no part in Brit invasion plans; Germans check all activity
snippet: VICHY, France, July 31--Paris is entirely outside the zone of German military operations aimed at an invasion of the British Isles, a visit to that city has disclosed. The German Army's activity in Paris is largely industrial and financial, and......

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: OCCUPATION AND REHABILITATION OF CONQUERED AREAS

headline.main: PARIS HAS NO PART IN BLITZKRIEG PLAN; Industrial and Financial Work, Instead of Drive on Britain, Occupies Nazis There EVERY ACTIVITY CHECKED Custodians of Some Buildings Are Warned Not to Permit Any One to Go Inside

lead_paragraph: VICHY, France, July 31--Paris is entirely outside the zone of German military operations aimed at an invasion of the British Isles, a visit to that city has disclosed. The German Army's activity in Paris is largely industrial and financial, and...
